title: Crelu should have axis
body_html: Currently, the tf.nn.crelu activation concatenates along the last axis. This would work fine for dense layers and conv layers where the data_fromat=channels_last, but this would be incorrect if invoked on the widely used data_format=channels_first for conv layers on the GPU.
body_text: Currently, the tf.nn.crelu activation concatenates along the last axis. This would work fine for dense layers and conv layers where the data_fromat=channels_last, but this would be incorrect if invoked on the widely used data_format=channels_first for conv layers on the GPU.
body: Currently, the `tf.nn.crelu` activation concatenates along the last axis. This would work fine for dense layers and conv layers where the `data_fromat=channels_last`, but this would be incorrect if invoked on the widely used `data_format=channels_first` for conv layers on the GPU.
